channel.title: Cloud Run on Mikhail Shilkov
channel.description: Recent content in Cloud Run on Mikhail Shilkov

item.title: Hosting Azure Functions in Google Cloud Run
item.description: Suppose you are a .NET developer, you love the Function-as-a-Service (FaaS) model, but you want to run your serverless functions in Google Cloud. You want to keep using C# or F#, and still leverage all serverless benefits—ease of use, scalability, elasticity, pay-per-value cost model—running in GCP.

item.title: Serverless Containers with Google Cloud Run
item.description: Google Cloud Run is the latest addition to the serverless compute family. While it may look similar to existing services of public cloud, the feature set makes Cloud Run unique:
